The claim was made by former Texas Gov: Rick Perry during a fundraising dinner for the Republican Party of Virginia.
The claim was fact: checked by PolitiFact National, who examined a similar claim made by President Barack Obama.
Data from the U: S. Energy Information Administration was used to verify the claim, specifically looking at overall oil production figures.
The U: S. ranked first in overall oil production when considering a comprehensive measure that includes biofuels and other liquids, but ranked third when considering just crude oil production.
